name: Brick Breaker Twisted
description:
I have been taking a course from Udemy, I wanted to share one of the project inspired by my course. This will be the first of many games, I have plans for many more. If you love this game or find it interesting please let me know and making a donation helps fund and inspired my up and coming games! :)

Notes/Sources

I don't plan to make any changes unless there enough people that would like to see more! So, if you love it let me know!

I got my music here, C.P.Byran has some great stuff!

https://www.freesoundtrackmusic.com/guest/demolib

Please provide feedback it helps me greatly to improve! Thanks for Checking out Brick Breaker!
